mapper.insert: insert into tp_account_log (log_id, user_id, user_money, frozen_money, pay_points, change_time, desc, order_sn, order_id, change_type, second_type, third_type, status, is_delete) values (#{log_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{frozen_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pay_points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{change_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{change_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{second_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{third_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_delete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update tp_account_log set user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_money = #{user_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, frozen_money = #{frozen_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_points = #{pay_points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change_time = #{change_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_sn = #{order_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change_type = #{change_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_type = #{second_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, third_type = #{third_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{is_delete,jdbcType=BIT} where log_id = #{log_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select log_id, user_id, user_money, frozen_money, pay_points, change_time, desc, order_sn, order_id, change_type, second_type, third_type, status, is_delete from tp_account_log where log_id = #{log_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select log_id, user_id, user_money, frozen_money, pay_points, change_time, desc, order_sn, order_id, change_type, second_type, third_type, status, is_delete from tp_account_log
select * from tp_account_log where user_id = #{user_id} and change_type = #{type} limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
select count(log_id) from tp_account_log where user_id = #{user_id} and change_type = #{type}
select sum(user_money)+sum(frozen_money) as count_money from tp_account_log where user_id = #{user_id}
